div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.h2: Cleveland - Freeman - Lake Annette - West Line
div.h3: 5801 E State Route 2, Cleveland, MO 64734 | Phone: (816) 250-2994 | Fax: (816) 899-2823

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: ​In compliance with guidance from Cass County Health Department, this is to announce that we will be out of session through Friday, April 24th. Anticipated restart date will be April 27th, unless there is an extension from the health department.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h2.div: SCHOOL MEALS to be Delivered to Midway R-I Communities

h3.div: Midway Food Service will continue to prepare BREAKFASTS and LUNCHES for students from preschool-age to 12th grade. All meals are ready-to-eat items or microwavable at home. Meals may still be picked up by students, parents or babysitters. Starting tomorrow, April 8th, meals will only be available for pick up on Mondays and Wednesdays. On Monday, families can pick up meals for Monday & Tuesday. On Wednesday, families can pick up meals for Wednesday through Friday. For more information, check your email or Facebook.

This change will help to minimize exposure of staff and families to each other in this time of uncertainty. We want you to know that our staff members who are preparing and delivering these meals are taking every precaution to keep themselves and our families healthy. Safety is our number one priority and we require workers to go through a health screening each morning.
Please remember, these meals are provided FREE TO ALL students and preschoolers, even if the family does not qualify for free or reduced-price meals during the regular school year.

Meals will be provided via DRIVE-THRU ONLY IN THE FRONT DRIVE OF THE SCHOOL. Meals may be picked up from 9:00 to 9:30 a.m. each morning, Monday thru Friday. Please enter the drive from the west end (i.e. Groh Road).
The meals will be packaged for GRAB-N-GO service. Breakfast and lunch will be provided at the same time. All meals will be ready-to-eat items or microwavable at home.
Families who live in remote locations may contact the school at schoolnotes@midwayk12.net for assistance.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.p: Parents please click the "Parent Input" link above to fill out a data survey for the district. We would like for our families to answer a few questions regarding meal needs and other information regarding the possibility of an extended closure.
